name: Zombie Crawler (Emchi's GameJam Page)
description:
You are an unlucky Zombie...

They burried you deep down in the ground, but you show'em and crawl your way up.

Avoid the rocks, they cost you Gargh but eat brains on the way to increase it.

If you are out of Gargh, you die sort of... well again... But remember the motto of the GameJam:

Death is only the beginning!

And you keep on trying... and trying...

Idea & Design & Artwork & Programming & Testing was done by the whole gang of five: My dear wife Nadine, me and our beloved kids Christina, Fabian, Ida. Way to got kids!

Also a big shout out to gamedev.tv, especially Rick, who mentioned he will be teaming up with his daughter. This got us into developing a complete game as a family first time. It has been a very exciting way to spend two weekends together ;-)

You can download the source code and artwork at: https://github.com/markus-kraeutner/ZombieCrawler
